DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the ability of fluid responsiveness by stroke volume variation value of NICOM(Noninvasive cardiac output monitor)system during congenital cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Fluid Responsiveness by NICOM (Non-invasive Cardiac Output Monitoring) in Children With Congenital Heart Disease After Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: congenital cardiac surgery < 6 years old who were required the evaluation by transesophageal echocardiography right heart failure supported by more than 2 inotropic agents reduced kidney function any valvar stenosis moderate or severe tricuspid regurgitation single ventricle
